a11y.check: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct or incorrect.
a11y.showSolution: Show the solution. The correct solution will be displayed.
a11y.retry: Retry the task. Reset all elements and start the task over again.
a11y.instructionsGrabbed: Press up and down arrow keys to change position, spacebar to drop, escape to cancel

taskDescription: Help me to be a good procedure text please!
paragraphs:
How to Make Pizza

First, roll the dough into a thin circle.

Spread sauce over the dough using a spoon.

Sprinkle cheese over the sauce.

Next, add toppings to the pizza.

Bake pizza in the oven for 15 minutes

Finally, cut the pizza. Then serve and enjoy.
